brainly_data.question:
What is an epic hero?

a. the larger-than-life central character in a long narrative poem
b. one of the nine goddesses of the arts, literature, and sciences
c. a person or animal that takes part in an epic poem
d. a character in conflict with the central character in an epic
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question:
What is an epic hero?

a. the larger-than-life central character in a long narrative poem
b. one of the nine goddesses of the arts, literature, and sciences
c. a person or animal that takes part in an epic poem
d. a character in conflict with the central character in an epic
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: The correct answer would be A.) the larger-than-life central character in a long narrative poem.
